cards.name: Maplewood Guardian
cards.description: A wise and ancient protector of the forest, standing watch beneath the maple trees.

cards.name: Riverbank Otter
cards.description: A playful swimmer known for its clever tricks and love of shiny treasures.

cards.name: Thornpaw Tracker
cards.description: A stealthy scout with keen senses, navigating brambles with silent steps.

cards.name: Blooming Burrow
cards.description: A vibrant underground sanctuary where flora and fauna thrive in harmony.

cards.name: Sunpetal Squirrel
cards.description: A nimble creature that gathers sunlight as cheerfully as it gathers nuts.

cards.name: Warren Warden
cards.description: A fierce and noble guardian of woodland tunnels, defending its kin with valor.

cards.name: Frostleaf Fox
cards.description: A sly and elegant fox whose footsteps frost the ground wherever it goes.

cards.name: Grovebound Hare
cards.description: A swift traveler bound to ancient groves, leaping through lore and legend.

cards.name: Burrowwise Owl
cards.description: A nocturnal sage whose wisdom echoes through the winding burrows of the woods.

cards.name: Thicket Trickster
cards.description: A mischievous spirit of the underbrush, delighting in riddles and illusions.

cards.name: Mosscoat Mouse
cards.description: A tiny explorer with a mossy coat, blending perfectly into the forest floor.

cards.name: Petalplume Finch
cards.description: A bright and melodic bird whose feathers bloom like spring petals.

cards.name: Brambleback Badger
cards.description: A tough and tenacious burrower, armored by years spent in the thorny wilds.

cards.name: Sunrise Stoat
cards.description: A golden-coated hunter that stirs with the first light, swift and silent.

cards.name: Hollowhide Hedgehog
cards.description: A reclusive creature who makes its home in hollow logs, curled in peace and patience.
